titleStmt.title: An excellent ballad, intituled, The wandring Prince of Troy To the tune of, Queen Dido.
Wandring Prince of Troy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "When Troy town for ten years wars,".
Place of publication from and publication date conjectured by Wing.
First published [1660?] as: A proper new ballad, intituled, the wandring Prince of Troy. Cf. Wing P3668.
Reproduction of the original in Glasgow University Library.
